mapper.sql: SELECT course_id, course_nm, course_image, course_reg_start_date, course_reg_end_date , course_start_date, course_end_date, course_day, course_time, course_target , course_cost, course_info, tb_course.user_id, croom_id, user_name, tb_course.course_cate_cd FROM tb_course join tb_user on tb_course.user_id = tb_user.user_id join course_type on tb_course.course_cate_cd = course_type.course_cate_cd

choose.otherwise: AND (course_nm LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR tb_course.user_id LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.select: SELECT course_id, course_nm, course_reg_start_date, course_reg_end_date, course_day, course_time, course_cost FROM tb_course
order by course_reg_start_date desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from tb_course where true
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.tb_course (course_id, course_nm, course_image, course_reg_start_date, course_reg_end_date, course_start_date , course_end_date, course_day, course_time, course_target, course_cost, course_info, user_id, croom_id) VALUES(#{course_id}, #{course_nm}, #{course_image}, #{course_reg_start_date}, #{course_reg_end_date}, #{course_start_date} , #{course_end_date}, #{course_day}, #{course_time}, #{course_target}, #{course_cost}, #{course_info}, #{user_id}, #{croom_id})
